sourcesContent:
import UseFetch from "../hooks/UseFetch" import PositiveVote from "./User/PositiveVote" import NegativeVote from "./User/NegativeVote" import '../App.css' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import image from '../img/bomba.jpg' function ArticlePage({token, articleId, userId}) { const info= UseFetch(`http://localhost:4000/noticia/${articleId}`) return (
{userId===info.usuario ? : <>}

{info.titulo}

{info.fecha.split('T00:00:00.000Z')} {info.foto ? : <>}

{info.entradilla}

{info.texto}

{ token ?
: <>}
#{r?.tema}
) } export default ArticlePage;
